RAMESH.P
Address: 3/121, Valnayakkanur, Koombur, Dindigul, TamilNadu, India-624710
Contact No.: +91 9789325937/ E-Mail: rameshppalanisamy@gmail.com
Seeking assignments in the areas of Production engineering with an organization of
repute in the Manufacturing sector
PROFILE SNAPSHOT
An astute professional with  3.5 years of experience in Production and planning Engineering. 
Presently associated with CMO AXIS OUTSOURSING PVT LTD as Business Promotion Executive.
Proficient  in  supervising  the  Production  processes  and  providing  valuable  suggestions  for  efficiency
enhancement. 
Demonstrated analytical skills with proven expertise in communication and relationship management. 
CAREER EXPERIENCE:
THE COIMBATORE CNC PARTS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
Position: EMPLOYEE (Production Engineer)
Duration: May 2013 – December 2014
Key Result Areas:
Planning the production against the customer schedule. 
Organize plant start-up and shut-down schedules to ensure minimum loss of production time
Set priorities for production departments. Review daily activities by conducting morning meetings.
Planning the production schedule as per plan and execute with the production supervisor.
Finalize the Monthly/Weekly/Daily production schedule based on Marketing/Logistics inputs, Sales forecast and
current orders.
Set daily/weekly/monthly objectives and communicate them to employees.
Organize workflow by assigning responsibilities and preparing schedules.
Identify issues in efficiency and suggest improvement.
Maintain housekeeping standards to ensure a clean and safe workplace.
Proper work allotment of workers and manage the process.
To attend the breakdowns of machines and to get it resolved immediately.
Prepare Daily, weekly & monthly reports.
GURU ENGINEERING AND CONTRACTORS
Client: Larsen & Toubro Hydrocarbon Engineering
Project: Reliance Industries limited-Jamnagar  
Position: Junior Executive (Planning Engineer)
Duration: December 2014 – December 2016
Key Result Areas:
Monitoring day to day work progress and prepare the weekly and monthly program and report.
Review drawings and study the site condition in prior to the construction phase to mobilize tools and man
powers as necessary as required.
Assisting construction team in reading drawings, locating the exact point of installation, supply and monitoring
inventory.
Monitoring the entire execution phase to make sure that the piping arrangements.
Troubleshooting field raised issues and providing immediate solution to the execution team.Co-ordinate  with  operation and  maintenance team to  ensure that the unit requirements  are  met during
construction.
Ensure that safety measures are considered during construction and permits are granted after safety inspection.
Prepare documentation about the summary of the project, safety issues, lesson learnt & material balance
inventory report.
Examining hydro testing process and approve the piping after completion of testing.
Follow up with quality inspection team to examine that the weld joints are tested for its integrity.
Coordinating with operation team during the commissioning of the project.
CMO AXIS OUTSOURSING SERVICES PVT LTD
Founded in 2008, CMO Axis is a global pioneer in Sales and Marketing Process Outsourcing with a vision to
deliver transformational business and operational advantages to global organizations and marketing teams
through  a  combination  of  strategic  advisory,  shared  services  delivery  and  business-results  focused
outsourcing. 
Position       : Business Promotion Executive
Duration: JAN 2017 – PRESENT
